title: Meeting Enemy Ruler Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Meeting Enemy Ruler Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Meeting Enemy Ruler Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 126
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَجْعَلُكَ فِي نُحُورِهِم، وَنَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شُرُورِهِمْ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma inna najAAaluka fee nuhoorihim wanaAAoothu bika min shuroorihim.
items.translation: O Allah, we place You before them and we take refuge in You from their evil.

items.title: Dua 127
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ عَضُدِي، وَأَنْتَ نَصِيرِي، بِكَ أَحُولُ وَبِكَ أَصُولُ، وَبِكَ أُقاتِلُ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma anta AAadudee, wa-anta naseeree, bika ajoolu wabika asoolu wabika oqatil
items.translation: O Allah, You are my supporter and You are my helper, by You I move and by You I attack and by You I battle.

items.title: Dua 128
items.translation: Allah is sufficient for us, and how fine a trustee (He is).

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء العدو
